(Simplified: 埘)
Chinese Definition:
①古代稱牆壁上挖洞做成的雞窩。

塒字的基本解释

塒
shí
见“埘”。

塒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shí］
［《廣韻》市之切，平之，禪。］
“埘1”的繁体字。
(1)凿垣为鸡窝曰埘。亦指在墙上凿的鸡窝。
(2)泛指禽类在墙上的窝。

塒字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页235第11
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】市之切【正韻】辰之切，?音時。鑿垣爲雞作棲曰塒。【詩·王風】君子于役，雞棲于塒。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shí］
["Guangyun" City Zhiqi, Pingzhi, Zen. ]
"埘1" in traditional characters.
(1) Chisel the wall to make the chicken coop called 埘. Also refers to the chicken coop chiseled on the wall.
(2) Generally refers to the nests of birds on the wall.
Yong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　埘; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 235-11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] City cut [Zheng Yun] Chen Zhi cut, sound time. Chisel the wall for the rooster to make a habitat called 埘. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】The gentleman is in service, and the chicken is living in the village.
